DOC.brief_summary: The project 's primary purpose test hypothesis oral administration low single dose Î²-antagonist propranolol ( 40 mg ) reduce pain sensitivity patient masticatory muscle pain .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Propranolol Autonomic Nervous System Muscle Pain
DOC.criteria: Meet Research Diagnostic Criteria Temporomandibular Disorders ( RDC/TMD ) myofascial TMD diagnosis correspond group 1a 1b Characteristic Pain Intensity ( CPI ) equal 20 ( Axe II , RDC/TMD questionnaire ) Women childbearing potential must use adequate contraception Signed consent statement Other acute pain cause acute toothache pain condition investigator estimate contraindicate participation experiment Recognized exist malignancy within last 5 year Known HIV Abuse drug include alcohol Recognized Raynaud 's syndrome Former sympathectomy Known cardiovascular disease include abnormal EKG blood pressure ( ECG12 record first trial session assess physician ) Recognized lung insufficience , include bronchial asthma Known severe hepatic renal dysfunction Known diabetes mellitus Known severe depression Pregnancy ( test perform session 1 2 start session ) Fertility Treatment Lactation Postmenopausal Previous adverse reaction take betablocker , include hypersensitivity propranolol excipients Patients read understand write information Patients follow protocol Patients agree comply requirement participation study regard food intake , physical activity , etc .
